metadata.synopsis: AD for Halsin and Jaheira if they drink the explosive potion. This AD will be only triggered AFTER drinking the potion, and the character will be poisoned after the explosion.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Use S_LOW_BloodMerchant_ExplosivePotion with a non-tadpoled companion.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Ngh... a foul brew. My innards beg for mercy.
